reviewText: The Berenstain bears have great dvd's that show great morals and lessons, this dvd is one of them.  It entertains my child and also provides great lessons.
I love Berenstain videos...they teach the values our children need in society today....and the grandchildren love the adventures.  thank you

This video is a very good one for family viewing. One slight drawback is that Papa Bear is seen
as the stupid character. I think the male figure in the home is to be honored as the leader of the home.
Overall I am happy with this product.
